history.text: Hi
What movie will we be talking about?
Hi
We'll be talking about How to Train Your Dragon
A 2010 animated film
Nice
Have you watched it?
I used to work in a movie theater and remember watching a bit of it when it first came out. Some of the CGI dragons and battle scenes were pretty cool.
It's based on a British book series, which I've never read
I've watched it as well but i will still ask you questions because that's the task i was assigned to do :)
Yeah, go ahead
Are the ratings good?
Yeah, it has a 98% Rotten Tomatoes and 7.9 audience score. 74/100 on Metacritic.
Nice! Do you care about ratings when you choose to watch a movie or not?

I mean, yeah, I do like to check out Metacritic and read some of the reviews there. I used to like going to the IMDb forum for movies, but they closed them a while back. I like talking about movies on Reddit and other sites too.
Looks like you really love watching movies
I used to go to the movies every week but now i have a child and going to movies is almost impossible lol
Yeah, I used to be more of a movie buff, now I go to the theater like once or twice every six months. But I watch movies on Amazon Video and stuff. I feel you, who has the time?

I watch movies on netflix and on demand on tv. 
Who is the director of this movie?
It has two directors. Chris Sanders & Dean DeBlois.
Do critics say it's a good movie?
Do you watch a lot of these types of movies with your kid?
Yeah, critics gave it good to great reviews
No, my kid is too little. He is only 10 months. I watch all types of movies. I'd say watching movies is my hobby
Nice, what's your favorite movie?
I don't think i have a favorite movie. I love so many movies. I love Stephen King's movies
"It" is probably my favorite. The original one. Not the new one
Cool, yeah there are a lot to choose from. I tend to like drama, comedy-drama, some thrillers. Action adventure
The original was very good, scared the s**t out of me as a kid.
Haven't seen the remake yet

Yes lol. I remember sleeping with my lights on for a while. I don't even know why my parents let me watch it. lol 
Who is your favorite dragon in
this movie
I guess the dragon companion of the main character Hiccup

uid2response.feedback: I already watched this movie but i would watch it again. I didn't really enjoy the conversation with the other user. Even though i asked questions about the movie it seemed like we didn't talk about this movie that much
